amendment.description: Amendment sought to extend the requirement for the Congressional Budget Office to prepare macroeconomic analysis of major legislation to bills or resolutions reported by the Appropriations Committees of each Chamber.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 112-383 to extend the requirement for the Congressional Budget Office to prepare macroeconomic analysis of major legislation to bills or resolutions reported by the Appropriations Committees of each Chamber.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Connolly (VA) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 237 (Roll no. 25).
